register.title: Hi! Welcome to Solid.
register.whatIsAProvider: What is a provider, and how should I choose one?
register.alreadySolid: I already have a Solid identity

about.team: <0>We are a group of students who developed a decentralizedroute app as an asignment for <1> Software Architecture course </1>  which takes place at University of Oviedo.</0>

dani.description: In charge of the persistance management. I also fix and tweak some things here and there and manage the planning of the work together with my colleagues.

angela.description: I love the design. For this reason I've worked on the interface of this application. My job is to provide an intuitive user interface.

ivan.description: I usually work on logic, functionality and tests, and try to help in everything I can. Two minds work better than one.

diego.description: I can handle the design and the programming of a proyect. So, I am in charge of some components and also I have done some tests.

noe.description: I like to develop the logic of the projects. I work mostly with the functionality of the application. However, I have also worked with components and graphical aspects, as well as developed tests using the Cucumber tool.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.content: There may be an error in the URL entered into your web browser. Please check the URL and try again. Or the page you're looking for has been moved or deleted
